li.label: Demonic Resilience
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} possesses an unnatural resilience, allowing {PAWN_objective} to endure pain far beyond normal limits. {PAWN_pronoun}'s body is tougher than most, shrugging off injuries that would cripple others.

li.label: Dark Hunger
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} harbors an insatiable hunger, consuming meals with unnatural speed. {PAWN_pronoun} also has a body that yields slightly more flesh, as if shaped by some dark, ravenous force.

li.label: Demonic Endurance
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with tireless determination, possessing a supernatural endurance that allows {PAWN_objective} to push forward even when others falter. Whether walking or crawling, {PAWN_pronoun} refuses to be slowed.
